00043   String extract_page(char *request) {
00044     String retstr;
00045     const char *base, *ptr;
00046     if (!strncmp(request, "GET ", 4)) {
00047       base = request + 4;
00048       if ((ptr = strchr(base, ' ')) != 0)
00049         retstr = String(base, ptr-base);
00050       else
00051         retstr = base;
00052     }
00053     else
00054       retstr = "-";
00055     return retstr;
00056   }
00057 
00063   String format_timestamp(struct tm tm) {
00064     return format("%d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d:%02d", tm.tm_year+1900, tm.tm_mon+1,
00065                   tm.tm_mday, tm.tm_hour, tm.tm_min, tm.tm_sec);
00066   }
00067 
00071   void report_error(Exception &e) {
00072     cerr << e << endl;
00073   }
00074 
00078   void handle_mutation_failure(TableMutatorPtr &mutator_ptr) {
00079     std::vector<std::pair<Cell, int> > failed_mutations;
00080 
00081     mutator_ptr->get_failed(failed_mutations);
00082     if (!failed_mutations.empty()) {
00083       for (size_t i=0; i<failed_mutations.size(); i++) {
00084         cerr << "Failed: (" << failed_mutations[i].first.row_key << ","
00085              << failed_mutations[i].first.column_family;
00086         if (failed_mutations[i].first.column_qualifier)
00087           cerr << ":" << failed_mutations[i].first.column_qualifier;
00088         cerr << "," << failed_mutations[i].first.timestamp << ") - "
00089              << Error::get_text(failed_mutations[i].second) << endl;
00090       }
00091     }
00092   }

00094   const char *usage =
00095     "\n"
00096     "  usage: apache_log_load [--time-order] <file>\n"
00097     "\n"
00098     "  Loads the Apache web log <file> into the LogDb\n"
00099     "  table.  By default, the row key is constructed\n"
00100     "  as:\n"
00101     "\n"
00102     "  <page> <timestamp>\n"
00103     "\n"
00104     "  This format facilitates queries that return\n"
00105     "  the click history for a specific page.  If\n"
00106     "  the --time-order switch is supplied, then\n"
00107     "  the row key is constructed as:\n"
00108     "\n"
00109     "  <timestamp> <page>\n"
00110     "\n"
00111     "  This format facilitates queries that return\n"
00112     "  a historical portion of the log.\n";
00113 
00114   const int RETRY_TIMEOUT = 30;
00115 
00116 }

00119 
00143 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00144   ApacheLogParser parser;
00145   ApacheLogEntry entry;
00146   ClientPtr client_ptr;
00147   TablePtr table_ptr;
00148   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00149   KeySpec key;
00150   const char *inputfile;
00151   bool time_order = false;
00152   String row;
00153 
00154   if (argc == 2)
00155     inputfile = argv[1];
00156   else if (argc == 3 && !strcmp(argv[1], "--time-order")) {
00157     time_order = true;
00158     inputfile = argv[2];
00159   }
00160   else {
00161     cout << usage << endl;
00162     return 0;
00163   }
00164 
00165   try {
00166 
00167     // Create Hypertable client object
00168     client_ptr = new Client( System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]) );
00169 
00170     // Open the 'LogDb' table
00171     table_ptr = client_ptr->open_table("LogDb");
00172 
00173     // Create a mutator object on the
00174     // 'LogDb' table
00175     mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator();
00176 
00177   }
00178   catch (Exception &e) {
00179     report_error(e);
00180     return 1;
00181   }
00182 
00183   memset(&key, 0, sizeof(key));
00184 
00185   // Load the log file into the ApacheLogParser
00186   // object
00187   parser.load(inputfile);
00188 
00189   // The parser next method will return true
00190   // until EOF
00191   while (parser.next(entry)) {
00192 
00193     // Assemble the row key
00194     if (time_order) {
00195       row = format_timestamp(entry.tm);
00196       row += " ";
00197       row += extract_page(entry.request);
00198     }
00199     else {
00200       row = extract_page(entry.request);
00201       row += " ";
00202       row += format_timestamp(entry.tm);
00203     }
00204 
00205     key.row = row.c_str();
00206     key.row_len = row.length();
00207 
00208     try {
00209       key.column_family = "ClientIpAddress";
00210       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.ip_address);
00211       key.column_family = "UserId";
00212       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.userid);
00213       key.column_family = "Request";
00214       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.request);
00215       key.column_family = "ResponseCode";
00216       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.response_code);
00217       key.column_family = "ObjectSize";
00218       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.object_size);
00219       key.column_family = "Referer";
00220       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.referer);
00221       key.column_family = "UserAgent";
00222       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.user_agent);
00223     }
00224     catch (Exception &e) {
00225       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00226       do {
00227         if (!mutator_ptr->need_retry())
00228           _exit(1);
00229         handle_mutation_failure(mutator_ptr);
00230       } while (!mutator_ptr->retry(RETRY_TIMEOUT));
00231     }
00232   }
00233 
00234   // Flush pending updates
00235   try {
00236     mutator_ptr->flush();
00237   }
00238   catch (Exception &e) {
00239     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00240     do {
00241       if (!mutator_ptr->need_retry())
00242         _exit(1);
00243       handle_mutation_failure(mutator_ptr);
00244     } while (!mutator_ptr->retry(RETRY_TIMEOUT));
00245   }
00246 
00247   return 0;
00248 }
